section.45: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:Neither nurse mutual hatred, nor jealousy, nor enmity, and become as fellow brothers and servants of Allah. It is not lawful for a Muslim that he should keep his relations estranged with his brother beyond three days
